fields.text: Thank you for calling MoogSoft in San Francisco, home of an AI-driven AIOps platform that analyzes billions of events to help top enterprises avoid outages and accelerate digital transformation.
For technical support and service assurance, press [INDEX].
For incident management or outage resolution, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you with our incident response team.
For platform setup, integrations, or AI configuration support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our integrations and configuration specialists.
For sales, licensing, or general inquiries, press [INDEX].
For sales inquiries and pricing details, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.
For partnership opportunities or media relations, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to our partnerships and communications team.
